name: WPForce Logout – WordPress User Login Logout Management Plugin
author: Mini Plugins

sections.description:
WPForce Logout allows administrators to log out all or selected users with a single click, enhancing the security of user accounts. It helps protect against brute force attacks and allows you to manage compromised accounts by forcing logout.

If you need to work on your WordPress website without any users being logged in, this plugin allows you to force all user accounts to be logged out. Additionally, if you suspect that your WordPress site is hacked, forcing logout will help you secure your site. This plugin is also useful for membership or pay-per-view sites to prevent password sharing among users.

You can easily view online/offline users, last login activity from the users tab.

Features:

  • Force Logout All Users
  • Logout Specific User(s)
  • Bulk Logout Users
  • View Online Users
  • Last Login Activity Tracking
  • Well Documented
  • Translation Ready

Extended Features:

  • Idle User Logout
  • Auto logout on browser close
  • Session expiration
  • Logout redirect

Upgrade to PRO

What’s Next?

If you like WPForce Logout, then consider checking out my other projects:
– WP Frontend Delete Account – Allows your customers to delete their account by themselves.
– WooCommerce Auto Delete Old Orders – Automatically delete old WooCommerce orders.
– WooCommerce Auto Delete Users With No Orders – Automatically delete users with no purchase history.
– WooCommerce Customer Journey – Displays every step of the customer until the order of the product in the orders page.
sections.faq:
If I forcefully log out users, can they log in again?

Yes, they will be able to log in with correct credentials.

Can I contribute?

Yes, you can! Join in on the GitHub repository.
sections.changelog:
2.1.0 – 06/18/2024

  • Fix – deprecated message automatic conversion of false to array

2.0.2 – 05/26/2024

  • Fix – Versioning issue (https://wordpress.org/support/topic/latest-update-has-wrong-versionin/)

2.0.1 – 04/19/2024

  • Fix – Submenu

2.0.0 – 04/xx/2024

  • Info – Tested upto 6.5

1.5.0 – 01/24/2022

  • Compatibility with WP 5.9
  • Added WP CLI commands

1.4.5 – 4/20/2021

  • Update online status for users with low capability.

short_description: Forcefully log out users from your WordPress site, manage online status, and track last login activity.
